item.title: Stochastic Optimal Control and Estimation with Multiplicative and Internal Noise
item.description: A novel algorithm significantly improves stochastic optimal control by accurately modeling sensorimotor noise, achieving substantially lower costs than current state-of-the-art solutions, particularly…
